item.title: Blog01
item.description: 01 April 30, 2025 I’m an aggressively subpar writer, but they tell me the only way to improve that quality is to write more, and in the public eye as well, so I have some skin in the game. I guess that’s valid advice; like a cornered weasel, I, too, can adapt and overcome when my back’s against the wall. Of course, I’m cheating a bit by labeling this in the public eye, but hey!

item.title: Blog02
item.description: 02 (Sinners film review) Director: # Ryan Coogler Year: # 2025 Watched on: April 27, 2025 Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (out of 5) It’s such an artistic achievement how Coogler blended culture and history with modern-day comedy with classic horror tropes into such an astonishing masterpiece!Multi-print film was so amazing! My only gripe is that I wasn’t able to watch it in 70 mm IMAX, but I’ll settle for a superb IMAX viewing.
